reviewText: Very poor edit & control of the music... some portions of the video had music that was so loud the narration could not be heard or understood. I am surprised that Amazon allowed something of this poor quality control & editing be sold under their name! I am NOT referring to the video or filming... strictly the narration that was added as the videos were being produced!
Gave as a gift to my Dad, for his 93rd Birthday. He is a Veteran, WWII Navy Seabee.
By far one of the best wwII battle films
